name: email-obfuscator-webcomponent-demo
description: Web Component that Obfuscates Email address in HTML source.

scripts.dev: npm run build:lib && npm install && vite --config ./demo/vite.config.ts
scripts.build:demo: npm run build:lib && npm install && vite build --config ./demo/vite.config.ts
scripts.build:lib: npm run copy-docs && npm run build --workspace=lib
scripts.docs:build: npm run build:lib && vitepress build docs

author: Rumaan K<hey@rumaan.dev>
